name: Siddhant Gupta
title: UI and Frontend Developer
about: Design is a vast field. As I grow and learn more, my understanding of it evolves. What began as a juvenile curiosity for me, has matured into a career, a compulsion and a way of experiencing the life itself. Front-end development was a natural succession for me as it allowed me convert my designs into reality, into something others can use and enjoy. I dabble with management and entrepreneurship in order to better understand the practicality, communicate smoothly with all parties involved, and become a better designer in the process. If I had to describe myself in one word, thatâ€™d be, STALWART.
